title: hyperlinks in messages don't open browser
content:
Hi, I hope you can help me with a problem I’m having. When I click on a hyperlink in a message, the link is hi-lighted but the browser does not load. If I right click on the hyperlink, a window pops up and I can choose among options to open link in browser or copy link and a couple of others. Open link in browser gives the same results as clicking on the hyperlink. If I click on copy link, I can then bring the browser up myself and paste and go and everything works as it should. I should note that I can click on links to other programs and they open as expected. I copied a hyperlink to a browser to a word document and when I clicked on it, the browser did open. I have changed default browsers and restarted the computer and Thunderbird to no effect. I looked at your general trouble-shooting guide and went through the first three steps and everything seems to be ok. I had this problem a year or so ago and it just went away after some time had passed. This time it’s been a couple of weeks. Any ideas? Stephen Niver

title: How to create a new folder to store important emails
content: I recently purchased a new computer and had computer experts install the thunderbird email system when they were setting up my computer. The system on the old computer was easy to set up and name a new folder. I cannot figure out how to do it on the new Thunderbird version
creator: aakerr48

title: How often does Thunderbird check for emails
content:
How often does Thunderbird check for emails? I have several email accounts and just wondering how frequently Thunderbird searches for new emails. I realize you can manually check for emails.

Thank you for your time and effort.
creator: razz3333

title: Email Reply in Conversation use
content:
Hi..On my email page inbox I have "Open in Conversation" Works fine for me when I use it.. Problem is that although the Reply in Conversation is high-lighted with a yellow star on the Inward Mail Icon when an Email arrives I can't tell which email the Reply is for.. 

I get Lots of Email Replies so which Email line is it?..

There is a Small icon in the left margin for a Reply or two but no more that that.. Some of my Emails have up to half a dozen Replies in Conversation..very frustrating.. Which means I have to hunt thru my Emails to find what Reply Received is for which Email.. I would like Mozilla Thunderbird to add (somehow) a high-light for the Reply in Conversation & which Email it belongs to... That would save me a lot of searching... Any idea's.. Thank-You ..
creator: bcpatterson01
